entry.title: OCB Unbleached Biodegradable Filters – Slim – 10 Packs x 120 Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: OCB
Type: Filter
Price: 29.07

Size: Extra Slim
Diameter: 6 mm
Pack: 120 Pieces
Box: 10 Packs

These slim unbleached biodegradable filters from OCB are pre-cut and packaged in a resealable bag. They’re ideal for smokers who value both convenience and quality. They filter out tar and other harsh chemicals while enhancing taste and allowing for airflow.

  • Slim 6 mm size
  • Ready to use pre-cut filters
  • Unbleached and biodrgradable
  • Convenient resealable bag
  • For handrolls or machines
  • Made in France

The iconic hologram logo says it all. With over 100 years of history, OCB has been producing premium rolling accessories for generations. Today, their top-quality smoking products can be found in stores across the globe and are enjoyed by smokers with a taste for the finer things.

entry.title: Mooselabs MouthPeace Filter Roll – 10PC
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mooselabs
Type: Filter
Price: 54.99

Keep your MouthPeace hitting fresh with these official replacement filters from Mooselabs! They remove the bad so you can feel better inhaling the good.

  • Triple-Layer Design
  • Activated Carbon Filtration
  • Biodegradable
  • Made from Recycled Materials
  • Filters Toxins
  • Enhances Taste
  • No-Touch Filter Eject
  • For Use with the Mooselabs MouthPeace

Did you know? Hemp smoke can deposit tar deep into the lungs because of how it’s inhaled.

After 16 months of R&D, the team at Mooselabs has created thir MouthPeace and MouthPeace Filters to address this problem. Made from biodegradable and recycled materials, the triple-layer activated carbon filters will sanitize smoke/vapor and enhance flavors by removing resins, toxins, and tar; all without blocking your intake or reducing airflow.

Using the no-touch design, eject the Filter by pushing it up and out with your thumb from the side of the MouthPeace. Replace as needed for optimal performance. 

See and feel the difference with the MouthPeace personal filter from Mooselabs!

entry.title: Zig-Zag Unbleached Rolling Papers 1 1/4
entry.summary:
Vendor: zig-zag
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 48.99

From the rolling paper experts at Zig-Zag comes Unbleached Rolling Papers 1 ¼. These premium blended fiber papers are 100% unbleached for a smooth smoke without any harsh chemical taste. They measure 78mm x 44mm and include 50 papers per booklet, with 25 booklets per carton.

Crafted from the finest blend of natural fibers, these uncompromising papers deliver a slow, even burn. Zig-Zags have a thin glue line derived from the sap of the African acacia tree. The natural properties of gum Arabic provide a consistent seal without impacting the taste of your smoke. Roll, light, and enjoy a premium smoking experience with Zig-Zag Organic Hemp.

 

  • Smooth & Slow Burning
  • 78mm x 44mm
  • Unbleached and Ultra Thin
  • 100% Natural Gum Arabic
  • 25 Booklets per Carton, 50 Papers per Booklet.
  • POP Display Tray Included

entry.title: Zig-Zag Green Wetproof Rolling Papers
entry.summary:
Vendor: zig-zag
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 45.99

From the rolling paper experts at Zig-Zag comes Zig-Zag Green Rolling Papers These premium flax papers are 70mm x 38mm and include 32 papers per booklet, with 24 booklets per carton.

Crafted from the finest blend of natural fibers, these uncompromising papers deliver a slow, even burn. The mid-weight paper used allows for better tar absorption, resulting in a smooth and steady smoking experience. Zig-Zags have a thin glue line derived from the sap of the African acacia tree. The natural properties of gum Arabic provide a consistent seal without impacting the taste of your smoke. Roll, light, and enjoy a premium smoking experience with Zig-Zag Green.

 

  • Mid-Weight Paper for Better Absorption
  • Wetproof for a Slow & Steady Burn
  • 78mm x 44mm
  • Made using Natural Flax Plant Fibers
  • 100% Natural Gum Arabic
  • 25 Booklets per Carton, 100 Papers per Booklet.
  • POP Display Tray Included

entry.title: JSB Bluntman & Chronic Horizontal Rolling Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jay and Silent Bob
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 3.40 - 4.60 (2 variants)

Jay & Silent Bob strike back with an all-new line of rolling trays. These trays are mad notes! Available in small and medium, they’re top quality and a must-have for any JSB fan. An everyday essential item, rolling trays are one of the most useful accessories for cannabis users everywhere. Beyond rolling, you can use your tray to reduce clutter and conveniently store you kit, or to easily take your kit with you on the go. Whether it’s convenience or portability you’re after, Jay & Silent Bob rolling Trays will deliver the good.

  • Made from Thick Metal Alloy
  • Extremely Smooth Glossy Surface
  • High Edges with Rounded Corners
  • Available in Small and Medium
  • 7 Exclusive Designs

The JSB “15 Bucks” rolling tray features Jay & Bob against a green background with the iconic quote overhead. It offers a smooth, glossy surface to roll on, complete with high edges and rounded corners.

entry.title: 4-Comp Smooth Crank Grinder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Grinder
Price: 9.99

Crank out some freshly busted bud with the 62mm Smooth Crank Grinder in Black. This matte black 4-comp grinder features a unique hand crank that is easy on the wrists. Grinding up even the stickiest nugs an easy operation thanks to its sharp, strong, diamond-shaped teeth. This novel 62mm contraption contains a built-in kief catcher and mesh screen, so you can put a little away for a rainy day with each grind.

  • Hand Crank
  • Clear Window
  • Diamond-Shaped Teeth
  • Pollen Screen
  • Kief Catcher
  • Four-piece design
  • Matte Black
  • 62mm Diameter

entry.title: Famous X 59mm Acrylic Grinder – Tray of 12 – Black/Red/White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Grinder
Price: 19.99

Affordable quality X smart design. This is Famous X, a collection which brings you functional everyday cannabis products at affordable prices.

The Famous X 59mm Acrylic Grinder is a lightweight, easy-to-use grinder with a classic 2-piece design. It’s sharp, pointed teeth will make short work of even the most dese buds. It’s low cost and consistent functionality make it a perfect addition to any stoner’s kit, for beginners and veterans like.

 

  • Lightweight acrylic body
  • Sharp, pointed teeth
  • Classic 2-piece design
  • Available in 3 varieties
  • POP display tray included
  • 60mm diameter
  • Assorted tray of 12

entry.title: GNR Was Here Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: GUNS N ROSES
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 3.40 - 4.60 (2 variants)

GNR Rolling Trays

  • Made from aluminum
  • Compact design
  • Non-stick rolling surface
  • Rounded edges
  • High-quality graphic
  • Available in Small and Medium

 

Our officially licensed Guns N’ Roses line of smoking accessories is back with an all-new set of rolling trays! As with the other pieces in this seriously cool collection, the new trays feature iconic artwork familiar to superfans or anyone who loves rock music in general. Be sure to keep good times rolling with GNR Rolling Trays!

These trays have been cut from quality aluminum and were made with durability in mind. They come in two sizes, measuring 18 x 14 cm / 7 x 5.5 inches (small) and 27 x 16 cm / 10.6 x 6.2 inches (medium). Their size and durability make them excellent for indoor or outdoor use, while at home or on the go. The trays feature a non-stick rolling surface and rounded edges, making your rolling mix muxheasier to handle.

Small – 180x140x15 mm

Medium – 270x160x22 mm

GNR Was Here
The ghastly GNR Was Here features undead caricatures of all the Guns N’ Roses band members with a ghoulishly attractive white and green ghost motif.
